features: Multi-Use Double-Sided Dry Erase Board: The double-sided will make you have maximized writing space. It allows you to have two projects going. It is the best tool for small group teaching, home teaching or memo. You or children can carry this by themselves from room to room. Also b best for teachers teaching in small groups. Perfect for reading, learning, presentation, arts and education. It can hang and stand, almost any place you can put to remind you not forget the important thing.

Large Size & Super Value Pack: The 16 X 12 inches lightweight double-sided dry erase board set comes with 10 pcs magnetic dry erase markers (include 8 color), 4 pcs magnetic piece, 1 pcs dry eraser, 1 pcs marker holder. This big dry erase whiteboard is great size for office desktop, study table, bedside table, class podium and kitchen counter. Portable design makes it easy to change placement as you like. Carry this portable erase board with stand on your trips, travels and holidays easily.

Portable Magnetic Whiteboard with Stand: Double sided stand-up little tabletop magnetic dry erase whiteboard easel with solidly built. The dry erase board have 360-degree adjustable viewing angle, and white board comes with metal stand. It can lay down as a flat whiteboard, hang on wall or to do list whiteboard stand on desk. No sliding, never fall flat. Best tool for home, class, office and any place you want.

Ideal Gift for Kids & Students: Our hangable dry erase board is cool for the kitchen, dorm, bedroom and office. This personal large white board also can be a calendar. Our easel whiteboard is a great learning board that help students lesson plans go smoothly. Also enhance children creative and boost kids' drawing and writing skills. It's can be used to math practicing and teacher teaching. It’s the best gift for the workers, home chef, adult, students, teenaged and kids.

Smoothly Writing & Easy to Clean: Magnetic small desktop white board comes with a smooth and durable writing surface. It's easy to write on and easy to wipe clean without stain. The double-sided lapboard will give you maximize writing space. Our white board set is safe for kids. Please peel off protective film on double sides before using.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Small Dry Erase Board with Stand - The Perfect Portable Solution! The package includes: -- 1 * Whiteboard with Stand: With a convenient stand, this whiteboard can be easily positioned anywhere you need it. Its surface is smooth, allowing for easy writing and erasing. -- 10 * Whiteboard Pens: We provide you with an ample supply of pens, ensuring you won't run out anytime soon. They are specially designed for use on whiteboards and produce clear, bold lines. -- 1 * Magnetic Board Eraser: Keep your whiteboard clean and ready for new ideas with our magnetic eraser. It conveniently sticks to the board, making it easily accessible. -- 4 * Magnets: These magnets are perfect for attaching important documents, notes, or reminders to your whiteboard. They securely hold your papers in place, preventing them from falling off. -- 1 * Pen Holder: Keep your pens neatly organized with our convenient pen holder. Easily attach it to the whiteboard, ensuring your pens are always within reach.

Looking for a whiteboard that is versatile, durable, and can be used in any setting? Look no further! Our Mini Dry Erase Board with Stand is the ideal choice for all your writing and presentation needs.

Here's why you should choose our Dry Erase Board with Stand: 1. Incredible Value: Get a double-sided whiteboard that offers endless writing space at an unbeatable price. 2. Write Thousands of Times: Our whiteboard's high-quality surface allows you to write and erase thousands of times without any residue or ghosting. 3. Portable and Convenient: With its lightweight design and compact size, you can easily carry this portable whiteboard to wherever you need it. 4. Protected Writing Surface: The whiteboard is carefully packaged to ensure that it arrives in perfect condition, with a protective surface that will keep your writing looking clear and vibrant. 5. Sturdy and Durable: Made from durable aluminum, our whiteboard and stand are built to withstand daily use and will last for years to come. 6. Sleek Silver Design: The fashionable silver color adds a touch of elegance to any space, be it your office, classroom, or home. 7. Improved Stability: Our whiteboard features an improved standing knob that ensures the board stays stable and upright, allowing you to focus on your presentation without any distractions. 8. Versatile Functionality: Whether you're giving a presentation, drawing, planning, organizing, or teaching, our Mini Dry Erase Board with Stand is the perfect tool for any task.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my classroom when it was on sale. Wasn’t exactly sure when and where I would use it but that size of board would come in handy. I use it for my reading groups. Unexpectedly, the magnets really help with a visual I do. Markers are an added bonus. It’s not too heavy to hold and sits nicely on a table with the stand pulled out. Wipes off easily. I will normally wipe off say day and not leave it over night to keep the white surface white.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size of board
reviews.reviewText: Love how it has a stand on it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have this mounted above my sink, so I know exactly what I need to do next or bills I need written out just so I can remember

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute board/ bad markers
reviews.reviewText: The board is nice. But 1/2 the markers are dried up. The 3 black ones are useless also the Pink marker seems to be a red dried up, it's not pink. I'm keeping it because I like the broad. Just know you will have to get better markers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cross Stitch Station
reviews.reviewText: I use this to put in my lap when I cross stitch. It’s great for holding the pattern, my needles, my scissors, & a highlighter right in my lap while I stitch. I use this just about every night & I love my set up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for leaving messages!
reviews.reviewText: I use mine outside on my porch for messages for my handyman and friends who stop by and can't find me! My friends kept complaining they didn't know where I was, now they do, they love the board and can leave me messages as well, now they know when I leave to go to the back 40 and when I will be back, if I am not back then they can start looking for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for grandson to practice writing on. Saves a lot of paper. He loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing is fine. It’s very cheap feeling, I wouldn’t want to use it to write on as it’s propped up. However, the whiteboard works and the markers are OK so I guess it’s worth the cheap price. I wish they would have included a wall mount option .. would have been easy and a much better permanent option. The markers won’t make any art but for basically free they are good :).
